title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1749/91 of 19 June 1991 re-establishing the levying of customs duties on products falling within CN code 9503, originating in China, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC) No 3831/90 apply
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1749/91  of 19 June 1991  re-establishing the levying of customs duties on products falling within CN code 9503, originating in China, to which the preferential tariff arrangements set out in Council Regulation (EEC)  No 3831/90 apply
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Article 1
As from 24 June 1991, the levying of customs duties, suspended pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 3831/90, shall be re-established on imports into the Community of the following products originating in China:
Order No  CN code  Description      10.1300  9503  Other toys, reduced size (scale) models and similar recreational models working or not, puzzles of all sorts

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 19 June 1991. For the Commission
Christiane SCRIVENER
Member of the Commission  (1) OJ No L 370, 31. 12. 1990, p. 1.
